name: Hypergate Operator
description: Automatically defines a one vs. rest labelling of cytometry data using the hypergate package.

properties.name: high_expression
properties.description: Quantile threshold for highly expressed markers

properties.name: low_expression
properties.description: Quantile threshold for lowly expressed markers

properties.name: expressed_marker
properties.description: Comma-separated list of markers that should be highly expressed

properties.name: not_expressed_marker
properties.description: Comma-separated list of markers that should be lowly expressed
